# File lib/flexmock/mock_container.rb, line 238
238:     def make_partial_proxy(container, obj, name, safe_mode)
239:       name ||= "flexmock(#{obj.class.to_s})"
240:       obj.instance_eval {
241:         mock = FlexMock.new(name, container)
242:         @flexmock_proxy ||= PartialMockProxy.new(obj, mock, safe_mode)
243:       }
244:       obj.instance_variable_get("@flexmock_proxy")
245:     end
